### Technical and Code

In ALP we explore how texts can be measurably compared to one another, and to do we turn texts into vectors. If you are interested in studying individual words, e.g. look at word vectors, look at the [following website](https://lena-voita.github.io/nlp_course/word_embeddings.html#pre_neural){target="_blank"}
